channel.title: [Help][508] How do i change xp rates/ more! [help]
channel.description: How do i change the xp rates on a 508 server and: How do i change the login screen: like welcome to --scape then message of the day. How do i ad NPC's, thanks for all the help for peope who help me!

item.title: [Help][508] How do i change xp rates/ more! [help]
item.dc:creator: @gecko_scape gecko~scape
item.description:
@gecko_scape wrote:

im not sure but the nc layout is public void addNewNPC(Player p, NPC npc, Stream str) {
if (npc == null || str == null || p == null) {
return;
}
p.npcsInList[npc.npcId] = 1;
p.npcList[p.npcListSize++] = npc;
str.writeBits(15, npc.npcId);
str.writeBits(14, npc.npcType);
str.writeBits(1, npc.updateReq ? 1 : 0);
int y = npc.absY - p.absY;
if (y > 15) {
y += 32;
}
int x = npc.absX - p.absX;
if (x > 15) {
x += 32;
}
str.writeBits(5, y);
str.writeBits(5, x);
str.writeBits(3, 0);
str.writeBits(1, 1);
appendNPCUpdateMasks(npc, update);
i think but im not sure where it goes!? i need npcs!!! please help

Read full topic
